thread.title: Indonesian police in gunfight after reported blast in Bandung city
thread.title_full: Indonesian police in gunfight after reported blast in Bandung city

title: Indonesian police in gunfight after reported blast in Bandung city
text:
Asia Pacific Indonesian police in gunfight after reported blast in Bandung city Indonesian police exchanged gunfire with an attacker after a reported explosion in a government building in the city of Bandung, according to police and TV footage. Posted 27 Feb 2017 12:10 Updated 27 Feb 2017 12:13 Arjuna District Office. (Photo: Twitter/ArjunaCicendo) A 
JAKARTA: Indonesian police exchanged gunfire with an attacker after a reported explosion in a government building in the city of Bandung, according to police and TV footage. 
"We're currently in the government office. There was information from the people that there was bomb explosion,‚Äù West Java police spokesman Yusri Yunus told Reuters. 
An exchange of gunfire could be heard on Indonesian TV footage filmed from outside the building in West Java. - Reuters
